title: Seventh Annual Friends of St Bride Library Conference
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001447/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 20.Mar.2008 4.44pm 

Seeking inspiration:  
creative thinking around the design process  
===========================================

Seventh annual Friends of St Bride Library Conference  
St Bride Library, London, 15 and 16 May 2008

===========================================

How do designers gain inspiration and how can we find more?

Sometimes inspiration can seem so elusive. We recognise the ‘eureka!’  
moment when it strikes and opens up new creative possibilities in our  
thinking and work. These can be the most pleasurable and effective  
moments in our design careers.

Come and hear how other graphic designers have approached the problem,  
and learn about the challenges that their careers have brought them, at  
this year’s conference.

Speakers include Paul Antonio, Joel Armstrong, Antonije Baturan, Sara De  
Bondt, Susanna Edwards, William Hall, George Hardie, Rian Hughes, Robin  
Kinross, Emily Luce, Karel Martens, Tyler Moorehead, Lizzie Ridout, Erik  
Spiekermann, Jeremy Tankard and Jake Tilson.

Book tickets online  
 [http://stbridelibrary.eventwax.com/seeking-inspiration](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001447/http:/stbridelibrary.eventwax.com/seeking-inspiration "http://stbridelibrary.eventwax.com/seeking-inspiration")

Early bird tickets cost £100 and are available until 15 April.  
The regular price is £150. Concessionary rates are available for paid-up  
Friends of St Bride Library, students and those over 60.

More information, including programme details when they become  
available, is at  
 [http://stbride.org/event/seekinginspiration](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327001447/http:/stbride.org/event/seekinginspiration "http://stbride.org/event/seekinginspiration")
